title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Keep the faith: We elected Donald Trump to stop fraud, deceit and cheating. Biden will not be president for all the people, Trump is. Trump got more minority votes than any Republican in 60 years. Harry Reid machine is finding ballots in Nevada. Where is the DOJ? Democrats and media know Trump was reelected. Biden landslide hoax helped soften the country to accept a Biden win via steal. The GOP did nothing to win minority votes, Trump did. Michael Steele, Never Trumper, announces plan to "resurrect" GOP. Have you lost your mind, Trump already did it! We're watching an election be stolen. O'Keefe finds USPS whistleblower. People are telling Trump to act presidential and accept defeat. Don't stop, Mr. President. Take this as far as you can. Trump team pushes back against the Harry Reid machine in Nevada. We need more than prayer to battle this fraud. Dead people voted in Michigan. Dems trying to steal NC. PA Supreme Court didn't overrule lower court ruling that Trump team can have access to vote-counting centers.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Widespread reports of fraud all over the country. Trump was leading on election night and the ballot fairy visited overnight. The Democrat donor who runs the Fox News decision desk. Market up because GOP held the senate. If no fraud is happening, why not let the Trump campaign watch the counting? Biden legal effort run by Bob Bauer, husband of Anita Dunn, whose firm paid for the Steele Dossier. Trump threatens the livelihood of everyone in the Swamp. Republicans didn't make inroads with minorities, Trump did. Democrats must get rid of Trump. The Russians are back on ABC News. Trump won't be going away no matter what happens. Caller wants to know why Trump didn't do more to stop the ballot fraud he warned us all about.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Are Trump voters mad enough to go march in the streets? Are they mad at the president for not doing more to stop the cheating he knew was coming? Democrats didn't waste the money they spent on Senate seats they didn't win, they achieved their objectives, still trying to flip the Senate. More votes than registered voters in Wisconsin, Michigan. Senator-Elect Tommy Tuberville on listening to Rush. Caller wants Trump to do rallies. Texas is slipping away. Democrats continue to win in blue states they've destroyed, GOP brand has been destroyed. Fox has Biden at 264, keep a sharp eye on them calling Nevada for Biden.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
